title: Weiz Citysheet
tagline: Your curiosity is the key—every corner is a tiny unlock.
short_intro: Weiz is a compact Styrian town where old streets, craft traditions, and a modern 'industry pulse' meet in one walkable loop. It's perfect for micro-quests: small checkpoints, quick unlocks, and quiet moments that feel surprisingly meaningful.

pois.name: Stadtmuseum Weiz
pois.story: Find one object that feels 'out of time'—describe it in one sentence.
pois.narration: A pocket-sized time machine: local history, craft, and the DNA of Weiz.
pois.hero_suggestion: Exterior facade / museum sign, straight-on, daytime, no people, clean frame.

pois.name: Plotzhirsch im Alten Rathaus
pois.story: Order or observe: capture one detail that feels uniquely Weiz (menu, sound, smell).
pois.narration: A modern tavern vibe inside old walls—perfect for a 'pause and recharge' checkpoint.
pois.hero_suggestion: Old Rathaus facade / restaurant sign, warm evening light, slight angle, cozy vibe.

pois.name: Taborkirche
pois.story: Stand still for 20 seconds. Notice 3 sounds. Keep the calm as your 'buff'.
pois.narration: Old stone, quiet air, this is where the city lowers its voice.
pois.hero_suggestion: Church exterior with steps/approach path, calm sky, wide shot, minimal clutter.

pois.name: Die Klingenschmiede
pois.story: Choose your 'craft token': strength, precision, or patience—pick one and say why.
pois.narration: Steel memory: blades, tools, and a craft-line that runs through centuries.
pois.hero_suggestion: Close-up detail: metal/steel tool texture/signboard, high contrast, craft vibe.

pois.name: Schloss Radmannsdorf
pois.story: Spot one defensive feature (real or imagined). Give it a playful name.
pois.narration: A castle with many lives—power, learning, and administration layered in one place.
pois.hero_suggestion: Wide exterior of the castle/building, include gate/entry lines, soft daylight, no people.

author: goAuD - WASD Travel
